H0.text: Which renowned explorer was killed while searching for Umberto Nobile and his airship 'Italia' in 1928. Roald Amundsen's rival, Robert Falcon Scott

H1.text: Which renowned explorer was killed while searching for Umberto Nobile and his airship 'Italia' in 1928. Ernest Shackleton

H2.text: Which renowned explorer was killed while searching for Umberto Nobile and his airship 'Italia' in 1928. Lincoln Ellsworth

H3.text: Which renowned explorer was killed while searching for Umberto Nobile and his airship 'Italia' in 1928. Amudsen

A4.text: Ellsworth senior died in Italy on June 2, 1925, while waiting for news of his lost son.

A5.text: Roald Amundsen was lost and presumed dead after the French Latham sea plane piloted by Ren√© Guilbaud, in which he was flying to join the rescue operation, disappeared en route to Spitsbergen.
